name: Pixel Prototypes
description:
Hey 🐊💕

Here are a few game prototypes I am doing to learn pixel art and game development.

Feel free to leave comments, they help a lot!

Press ESCAPE to go back to main menu any time.

Pixel Pirate 🐊🏴‍☠️
Arcade Platformer
Play as Croks the pirate and keep away evil seagulls!

Controls 🎮

Keyboard 
Arrow Keys - Move and Jump
Space - Shoot

Controller
Left Stick - Move
A - Jump
X or B - Shoot

Canyon Race 🐞⛰
Top Down Racing
Race against green creatures in dangerous canyon tracks!

Controls 🎮

Keyboard  
Arrow Keys - Accelerate and Turn
